step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Ensure your shoulder is stable.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide. This is key for promoting lymph flow.
Great job making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Focus on that squeezing sensation.
Perfect! You're opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
Second rep, looking good! Maintain that straight arm overhead and feel the stretch.
Nice work opening your hand wide again. Keep those fingers spread to maximize the pumping action.
You're making a strong fist and inhaling well. Remember to engage your arm muscles fully.
Fantastic! Exhale and relax your hand. You're doing great with the visualization and fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You've completed the Overhead Pumping exercise well! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and actively open and close your hand with each breath. This helps pump lymph fluid effectively. Keep up the great work!
